info.title: YetiForce API for Webservice App. Type: Portal
info.description:
Skip the `/webservice` fragment for connections via ApiProxy. There are two ways to connect to API, with or without rewrite, below are examples of both:
 * rewrite
 * - __CRM_URL__/webservice/Portal/Users/Login
 * - __CRM_URL__/webservice/Portal/Accounts/RecordRelatedList/117/Contacts
 * without rewrite
 * - __CRM_URL__/webservice.php?_container=Portal&module=Users&action=Login
 * - __CRM_URL__/webservice.php?_container=Portal&module=Accounts&action=RecordRelatedList&record=117&param=Contacts

servers.description: Demo server of the development version
